example.parse: (IP-OBJ (NP-SBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (ADVP (AD 已经)) (VP (VC 是) (ADJP-PRD (JJ 博士级))))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 在职生))) (PU ，) (VP (ADVP (AD 又)) (VP (VV 回头) (IP-OBJ (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 念) (NP-OBJ (NN 硕士)))))))
